title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 200.6 - Implementation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 200.6 - Implementation

State Regulations

In order to carry out the intent and purpose of these rules
and regulations, the authority may, through its agents or employees, by means
of directives, posted signs or other means, enlarge or make more specific these
rules and regulations, provided that such directives, posted signs or other
such means are not inconsistent with these rules and
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
200.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
